EmailTemplate.name: ISS email from notification OLD
EmailTemplate.subject: New notification on your IATA portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
A new notification has been posted on your IATA portal account.
Subject: "{!Notification__c.Subject__c} "
You can access it on your IATA Customer portal
Thank you in advance, IATA Customer Portal
